resources.string: Please enter a valid Zip Code value
Immediate support in all cities listed
Immediate support within 75 miles of city listed
1–2 months support within 75 miles of city listed — 20 Prescriptions per month needed
3–6 months support within 75 miles of city listed — 40 Prescriptions per month needed
Please remind the person you are speaking with that:
\u2022\u00a0\u00a0All prescriptions need to be received by ROMTech 3–4 weeks prior to surgical date
\u2022\u00a0\u00a0All deliveries to patients are pre-operative within 5 days of surgical date
\u2022\u00a0\u00a0First AccuAngle is applied by surgeon or staff at time of surgery or before discharge
\u2022\u00a0\u00a0Patients will be provided with educational materials by surgeon or surgeon staff
